items.title: Privacy/Updates/Help support system
items.summary: First-launch privacy consent, update prompts, and offline help center.
items.bodyMd:
## Added

- Mandatory privacy notice on first launch (agree/decline)
- Support Center: offline privacy policy, release notes, help docs (with search), feedback
- Update prompts: forced/optional update (config-based)

## Compatibility

- Minimum Android 6.0 (API 23)

items.title: Multi-point calibration + Support Center
items.summary: Added multi-point calibration for DP level and a support center entry.
items.bodyMd:
## Added

- DP level: multi-point range calibration (fit span or keep span)
- Support Center: privacy policy, release notes, help docs, feedback

## Fixed

- Prevent possible background/lockscreen state-save crash
